Class DefaultLexicalSmoother

All Implemented Interfaces:
LexicalSmoother, UsesLogger
public class DefaultLexicalSmoother
extends AdditiveLexicalSmoother
implements LexicalSmoother

Default lexical smoother.

The default lexical smoother is an additive smoother which uses 0.5 as the additive smoothing constant (Lidstone smoothing).
